description: The GA-02 RTO code was originally assigned to Margao in South Goa district but is currently not in use. Vehicle registrations for Margao are now handled by GA-08 (Salcette taluka).
address: 1st Floor, Matanhy Saldanha Administrative Complex, South Goa Collectorate, Arlem, Margao, Goa
note: This RTO code is not in use. For Margao registrations, please refer to GA-08.
